title: SPS HELP
description: Learn how to configure mandatory field options for creating customers.

sections.title: Tax Codes
steps: Navigate to Lists > Accounting > Tax Code
Click on 'New Tax Code'
Enter the tax code name and relevant details
Set the applicable tax rate and type if required
Click 'Save' to create the tax code

sections.title: Customer Types
sections.overview: Configure different customer categories for your business
steps: Navigate to Settings > Customer Management > Customer Types
Click 'Add New' button
Enter Type Name, Code, and Description
Set user role permissions
Save the customer type

sections.title: Price Levels
sections.overview: Set up pricing tiers for different customer segments
steps: Go to Settings > Pricing > Price Levels
Click 'Create Price Level'
Configure level name, code, and percentages
Link to customer types if needed
Activate the price level

sections.title: Payment Terms
sections.overview: Define payment conditions and due dates
steps: Access Settings > Finance > Payment Terms
Click 'Add Payment Terms'
Define term name and payment days
Set discounts and penalties if applicable
Mark default terms and save
